tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherInfo (
    weather_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    wind_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE WeatherInformation ( weather_id INT, temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT, precipitation FLOAT, date DATE, location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE GeographicalData ( location VARCHAR(255), latitude DECIMAL, longitude DECIMAL, elevation FLOAT );

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
	city_name VARCHAR(255),
	temperature FLOAT,
	humidity FLOAT,
	wind_speed FLOAT,
	PRIMARY KEY (city_name)
);

CREATE TABLE GeographicalData (
	city_name VARCHAR(255),
	latitude FLOAT,
	longitude FLOAT,
	elevation FLOAT,
	PRIMARY KEY (city_name)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)
